help-file.title: "WATCHING WALL"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: direction Aggressive: No Cumulative: N/A Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Illusion
This spell creates an illusionary stone wall with many eyes in it. It will show the caster the room from time to time. It will also show the room to the caster if someone is trying to destroy the wall.
